items.label: Search on Immoweb.be
items.description: The biggest property site in Belgium.

items.label: Schedule Visits Immediately
items.description: Good places go in 24 hours. Call, don't just email.

items.label: Get Fire Insurance (Assurance Incendie)
items.description: Mandatory for tenants. You cannot get keys without it.

items.label: Check Lease Registration
items.description: Landlord must register lease within 2 months. If not, you can leave without notice.

items.label: Read the Meters
items.description: Take photos of water, gas, electricity meters on day 1.
